DOC.detailed_description: This open , prospective , randomize , single center trial address primary research question : Does increase ambient operate room temperature result low rate composite neonatal morbidity ? During 1.2 year study period , operate room temperature labor delivery adjust either current standard care ambient operating room temperature 20°C ( 67°F ) , maximum temperature allowable per hospital policy current operating room , 24°C ( 75°F ) , determine cluster randomization . Composite neonatal morbidity record include hypoglycemia necessitating treatment ; need respiratory support within first 24 hour ; culture-proven sepsis ; mortality . Association outcomes type passive active warming perform include morbidity stratify gestational age well maternal outcome . In addition , electronic survey administer operating resident physicians assess experience study condition .
DOC.criteria: All pregnant woman neonates undergoing cesarean delivery Parkland Hospital Obstetrics Service Labor Delivery unit study period . Exclusion criterion include case cesarean delivery plan precipitous vaginal delivery occurs , intrauterine fetal demise diagnose prior start surgery , neonate note major congenital anomaly resuscitative effort perform ( `` comfort care '' provide ) , neonatal temperature available .
